00023 #include "GeometryExporter.h"
00024 #include "AnimationExporter.h"
00025 #include "MaterialExporter.h"
00026 
00027 template<class Functor>
00028 void forEachObjectInScene(Scene *sce, Functor &f)
00029 {
00030     Base *base= (Base*) sce->base.first;
00031 
00032     while(base) {
00033         Object *ob = base->object;
00034 
00035         f(ob);
00036 
00037         base= base->next;
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00041 void AnimationExporter::exportAnimations(Scene *sce)
00042 {
00043     if (hasAnimations(sce)) {
00044         this->scene = sce;
00045 
00046         openLibrary();
00047 
00048         forEachObjectInScene(sce, *this);
00049 
00050         closeLibrary();
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 // called for each exported object
00055 void AnimationExporter::operator() (Object *ob) 
00056 {
00057     FCurve *fcu;
00058     char *transformName;
00059     /* bool isMatAnim = false; */ /* UNUSED */
00060 
00061     //Export transform animations
00062     if (ob->adt && ob->adt->action)
00063     {
00064         fcu = (FCurve*)ob->adt->action->curves.first;
00065 
00066         //transform matrix export for bones are temporarily disabled here.
00067         if ( ob->type == OB_ARMATURE )
00068         {
00069             bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob->data;
00070             for (Bone *bone = (Bone*)arm->bonebase.first; bone; bone = bone->next)
00071                 write_bone_animation_matrix(ob, bone);
00072         }
00073 
00074         while (fcu) {
00075             //for armature animations as objects
00076             if ( ob->type == OB_ARMATURE )
00077                 transformName =  fcu->rna_path;
00078             else 
00079                 transformName = extract_transform_name( fcu->rna_path );
00080 
00081             if ((!strcmp(transformName, "location") || !strcmp(transformName, "scale")) ||
00082                 (!strcmp(transformName, "rotation_euler") && ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_EUL)||
00083                 (!strcmp(transformName, "rotation_quaternion"))) 
00084                 dae_animation(ob ,fcu, transformName, false);
00085             fcu = fcu->next;
00086         }
00087 
00088     }
00089 
00090     //Export Lamp parameter animations
00091     if ( (ob->type == OB_LAMP ) && ((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt && ((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt->action )
00092     {
00093         fcu = (FCurve*)(((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt->action->curves.first);
00094         while (fcu) {
00095             transformName = extract_transform_name( fcu->rna_path );
00096 
00097             if ((!strcmp(transformName, "color")) || (!strcmp(transformName, "spot_size"))|| (!strcmp(transformName, "spot_blend"))||
00098                 (!strcmp(transformName, "distance")) ) 
00099                 dae_animation(ob , fcu, transformName, true );
00100             fcu = fcu->next;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     //Export Camera parameter animations
00105     if ( (ob->type == OB_CAMERA ) && ((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt && ((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt->action )
00106     {       
00107         fcu = (FCurve*)(((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt->action->curves.first);
00108         while (fcu) {
00109             transformName = extract_transform_name( fcu->rna_path );
00110 
00111             if ((!strcmp(transformName, "lens"))||
00112                 (!strcmp(transformName, "ortho_scale"))||
00113                 (!strcmp(transformName, "clip_end"))||(!strcmp(transformName, "clip_start"))) 
00114                 dae_animation(ob , fcu, transformName, true );
00115             fcu = fcu->next;
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     //Export Material parameter animations.
00120     for (int a = 0; a < ob->totcol; a++)
00121     {
00122         Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, a+1);
00123         if (!ma) continue;
00124         if (ma->adt && ma->adt->action)
00125         {
00126             /* isMatAnim = true; */
00127             fcu = (FCurve*)ma->adt->action->curves.first;
00128             while (fcu) {
00129                 transformName = extract_transform_name( fcu->rna_path );
00130 
00131                 if ((!strcmp(transformName, "specular_hardness"))||(!strcmp(transformName, "specular_color"))
00132                     ||(!strcmp(transformName, "diffuse_color"))||(!strcmp(transformName, "alpha"))||
00133                     (!strcmp(transformName, "ior"))) 
00134                     dae_animation(ob ,fcu, transformName, true, ma );
00135                 fcu = fcu->next;
00136             }
00137         }
00138 
00139     }
00140 }
00141 
00142 //euler sources from quternion sources
00143 float * AnimationExporter::get_eul_source_for_quat(Object *ob )
00144 {
00145     FCurve *fcu = (FCurve*)ob->adt->action->curves.first;
00146     const int keys = fcu->totvert;  
00147     float *quat = (float*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * fcu->totvert * 4, "quat output source values");  
00148     float *eul = (float*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * fcu->totvert * 3, "quat output source values");
00149     float temp_quat[4];
00150     float temp_eul[3];
00151     while(fcu)
00152     {
00153         char * transformName = extract_transform_name( fcu->rna_path );
00154 
00155         if ( !strcmp(transformName, "rotation_quaternion") )    { 
00156             for ( int i = 0 ; i < fcu->totvert ; i++) {
00157                 *(quat + ( i * 4 ) + fcu->array_index) = fcu->bezt[i].vec[1][1];
00158             }
00159         }
00160         fcu = fcu->next;
00161     }
00162 
00163     for ( int i = 0 ; i < keys ; i++) {
00164         for ( int j = 0;j<4;j++)
00165             temp_quat[j] = quat[(i*4)+j];
00166 
00167         quat_to_eul(temp_eul,temp_quat);
00168 
00169         for (int k = 0;k<3;k++)
00170             eul[i*3 + k] = temp_eul[k];
00171 
00172     }
00173     MEM_freeN(quat);
00174     return eul;
00175 
00176 }
00177 
00178 //Get proper name for bones
00179 std::string AnimationExporter::getObjectBoneName( Object* ob,const FCurve* fcu ) 
00180 {
00181     //hard-way to derive the bone name from rna_path. Must find more compact method
00182     std::string rna_path = std::string(fcu->rna_path);
00183 
00184     char* boneName = strtok((char *)rna_path.c_str(), "\"");
00185     boneName = strtok(NULL,"\"");
00186 
00187     if ( boneName != NULL )
00188         return /*id_name(ob) + "_" +*/ std::string(boneName);
00189     else        
00190         return id_name(ob);
00191 }
00192 
00193 //convert f-curves to animation curves and write
00194 void AnimationExporter::dae_animation(Object* ob, FCurve *fcu, char* transformName , bool is_param, Material * ma )
00195 {
00196     const char *axis_name = NULL;
00197     char anim_id[200];
00198 
00199     bool has_tangents = false;
00200     bool quatRotation = false;
00201 
00202     if ( !strcmp(transformName, "rotation_quaternion") )
00203     {
00204         fprintf(stderr, "quaternion rotation curves are not supported. rotation curve will not be exported\n");
00205         quatRotation = true;
00206         return;
00207     }
00208 
00209     //axis names for colors
00210     else if ( !strcmp(transformName, "color")||!strcmp(transformName, "specular_color")||!strcmp(transformName, "diffuse_color")||
00211         (!strcmp(transformName, "alpha")))
00212     {
00213         const char *axis_names[] = {"R", "G", "B"};
00214         if (fcu->array_index < 3)
00215             axis_name = axis_names[fcu->array_index];
00216     }
00217 
00218     //axis names for transforms
00219     else if ((!strcmp(transformName, "location") || !strcmp(transformName, "scale")) ||
00220         (!strcmp(transformName, "rotation_euler"))||(!strcmp(transformName, "rotation_quaternion")))
00221     {
00222         const char *axis_names[] = {"X", "Y", "Z"};
00223         if (fcu->array_index < 3)
00224             axis_name = axis_names[fcu->array_index];
00225     }
00226 
00227     //no axis name. single parameter.
00228     else{
00229         axis_name = "";
00230     }
00231 
00232     std::string ob_name = std::string("null");
00233 
00234     //Create anim Id
00235     if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) 
00236     {   
00237         ob_name =  getObjectBoneName( ob , fcu);
00238         BLI_snprintf(anim_id, sizeof(anim_id), "%s_%s.%s", (char*)translate_id(ob_name).c_str(),
00239             transformName, axis_name);
00240     }
00241     else 
00242     {
00243         if (ma)
00244             ob_name = id_name(ob) + "_material";
00245         else
00246             ob_name = id_name(ob);
00247         BLI_snprintf(anim_id, sizeof(anim_id), "%s_%s_%s", (char*)translate_id(ob_name).c_str(),
00248             fcu->rna_path, axis_name);
00249     }
00250 
00251     openAnimation(anim_id, COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING);
00252 
00253     // create input source
00254     std::string input_id = create_source_from_fcurve(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, fcu, anim_id, axis_name);
00255 
00256     // create output source
00257     std::string output_id;
00258 
00259     //quat rotations are skipped for now, because of complications with determining axis.
00260     if (quatRotation) 
00261     {
00262         float * eul  = get_eul_source_for_quat(ob);
00263         float * eul_axis = (float*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * fcu->totvert, "quat output source values");
00264         for ( int i = 0 ; i< fcu->totvert ; i++)
00265             eul_axis[i] = eul[i*3 + fcu->array_index];
00266         output_id= create_source_from_array(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, eul_axis , fcu->totvert, quatRotation, anim_id, axis_name);
00267         MEM_freeN(eul);
00268         MEM_freeN(eul_axis);
00269     }
00270     else 
00271     {
00272         output_id= create_source_from_fcurve(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, fcu, anim_id, axis_name);
00273     }
00274     // create interpolations source
00275     std::string interpolation_id = create_interpolation_source(fcu, anim_id, axis_name, &has_tangents);
00276 
00277     // handle tangents (if required)
00278     std::string intangent_id;
00279     std::string outtangent_id;
00280 
00281     if (has_tangents) {
00282         // create in_tangent source
00283         intangent_id = create_source_from_fcurve(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT, fcu, anim_id, axis_name);
00284 
00285         // create out_tangent source
00286         outtangent_id = create_source_from_fcurve(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT, fcu, anim_id, axis_name);
00287     }
00288 
00289     std::string sampler_id = std::string(anim_id) + SAMPLER_ID_SUFFIX;
00290     COLLADASW::LibraryAnimations::Sampler sampler(sw, sampler_id);
00291     std::string empty;
00292     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, input_id));
00293     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, output_id));
00294 
00295     // this input is required
00296     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION, COLLADABU::URI(empty, interpolation_id));
00297 
00298     if (has_tangents) {
00299         sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, intangent_id));
00300         sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, outtangent_id));
00301     }
00302 
00303     addSampler(sampler);
00304 
00305     std::string target;
00306 
00307     if ( !is_param )
00308         target = translate_id(ob_name)
00309         + "/" + get_transform_sid(fcu->rna_path, -1, axis_name, true);
00310     else 
00311     {
00312         if ( ob->type == OB_LAMP )
00313             target = get_light_id(ob)
00314             + "/" + get_light_param_sid(fcu->rna_path, -1, axis_name, true);
00315 
00316         if ( ob->type == OB_CAMERA )
00317             target = get_camera_id(ob)
00318             + "/" + get_camera_param_sid(fcu->rna_path, -1, axis_name, true);
00319 
00320         if ( ma ) 
00321             target = translate_id(id_name(ma)) + "-effect"
00322             +"/common/" /*profile common is only supported */ + get_transform_sid(fcu->rna_path, -1, axis_name, true);
00323     }
00324     addChannel(COLLADABU::URI(empty, sampler_id), target);
00325 
00326     closeAnimation();
00327 }

00330 
00331 //write bone animations in transform matrix sources
00332 void AnimationExporter::write_bone_animation_matrix(Object *ob_arm, Bone *bone)
00333 {
00334     if (!ob_arm->adt)
00335         return;
00336 
00337     //This will only export animations of bones in deform group.
00338     /* if (!is_bone_deform_group(bone)) return; */
00339 
00340     sample_and_write_bone_animation_matrix(ob_arm, bone);
00341 
00342     for (Bone *child = (Bone*)bone->childbase.first; child; child = child->next)
00343         write_bone_animation_matrix(ob_arm, child);
00344 }
00345 
00346 bool AnimationExporter::is_bone_deform_group(Bone * bone)
00347 {   
00348     bool is_def;
00349     //Check if current bone is deform
00350     if ((bone->flag & BONE_NO_DEFORM) == 0 ) return true;
00351     //Check child bones
00352     else 
00353     {   
00354         for (Bone *child = (Bone*)bone->childbase.first; child; child = child->next) {
00355             //loop through all the children until deform bone is found, and then return
00356             is_def = is_bone_deform_group(child);
00357             if (is_def) return true;
00358         }
00359     }
00360     //no deform bone found in children also
00361     return false;
00362 }
00363 
00364 void AnimationExporter::sample_and_write_bone_animation_matrix(Object *ob_arm, Bone *bone)
00365 {
00366     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob_arm->data;
00367     int flag = arm->flag;
00368     std::vector<float> fra;
00369     //char prefix[256];
00370 
00371     FCurve* fcu = (FCurve*)ob_arm->adt->action->curves.first;
00372     while(fcu)
00373     {
00374         std::string bone_name = getObjectBoneName(ob_arm,fcu);
00375         int val = BLI_strcasecmp((char*)bone_name.c_str(),bone->name);
00376         if (val==0) break;
00377         fcu = fcu->next;
00378     }
00379 
00380     if (!(fcu)) return; 
00381     bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(ob_arm->pose, bone->name);
00382     if (!pchan)
00383         return;
00384 
00385     find_frames(ob_arm, fra);
00386 
00387     if (flag & ARM_RESTPOS) {
00388         arm->flag &= ~ARM_RESTPOS;
00389         where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
00390     }
00391 
00392     if (fra.size()) {
00393         dae_baked_animation(fra ,ob_arm, bone );
00394     }
00395 
00396     if (flag & ARM_RESTPOS) 
00397         arm->flag = flag;
00398     where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
00399 }
00400 
00401 void AnimationExporter::dae_baked_animation(std::vector<float> &fra, Object *ob_arm , Bone *bone)
00402 {
00403     std::string ob_name = id_name(ob_arm);
00404     std::string bone_name = bone->name;
00405     char anim_id[200];
00406 
00407     if (!fra.size())
00408         return;
00409 
00410     BLI_snprintf(anim_id, sizeof(anim_id), "%s_%s_%s", (char*)translate_id(ob_name).c_str(),
00411         (char*)translate_id(bone_name).c_str(), "pose_matrix");
00412 
00413     openAnimation(anim_id, COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING);
00414 
00415     // create input source
00416     std::string input_id = create_source_from_vector(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, fra, false, anim_id, "");
00417 
00418     // create output source
00419     std::string output_id;
00420     output_id = create_4x4_source( fra, ob_arm , bone ,  anim_id);
00421 
00422     // create interpolations source
00423     std::string interpolation_id = fake_interpolation_source(fra.size(), anim_id, "");
00424 
00425     std::string sampler_id = std::string(anim_id) + SAMPLER_ID_SUFFIX;
00426     COLLADASW::LibraryAnimations::Sampler sampler(sw, sampler_id);
00427     std::string empty;
00428     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, input_id));
00429     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, output_id));
00430 
00431     // TODO create in/out tangents source
00432 
00433     // this input is required
00434     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION, COLLADABU::URI(empty, interpolation_id));
00435 
00436     addSampler(sampler);
00437 
00438     std::string target = translate_id(bone_name) + "/transform";
00439     addChannel(COLLADABU::URI(empty, sampler_id), target);
00440 
00441     closeAnimation();
00442 }
00443 
00444 // dae_bone_animation -> add_bone_animation
00445 // (blend this into dae_bone_animation)
00446 void AnimationExporter::dae_bone_animation(std::vector<float> &fra, float *values, int tm_type, int axis, std::string ob_name, std::string bone_name)
00447 {
00448     const char *axis_names[] = {"X", "Y", "Z"};
00449     const char *axis_name = NULL;
00450     char anim_id[200];
00451     bool is_rot = tm_type == 0;
00452 
00453     if (!fra.size())
00454         return;
00455 
00456     char rna_path[200];
00457     BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "pose.bones[\"%s\"].%s", bone_name.c_str(),
00458         tm_type == 0 ? "rotation_quaternion" : (tm_type == 1 ? "scale" : "location"));
00459 
00460     if (axis > -1)
00461         axis_name = axis_names[axis];
00462 
00463     std::string transform_sid = get_transform_sid(NULL, tm_type, axis_name, false);
00464 
00465     BLI_snprintf(anim_id, sizeof(anim_id), "%s_%s_%s", (char*)translate_id(ob_name).c_str(),
00466         (char*)translate_id(bone_name).c_str(), (char*)transform_sid.c_str());
00467 
00468     openAnimation(anim_id, COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING);
00469 
00470     // create input source
00471     std::string input_id = create_source_from_vector(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, fra, is_rot, anim_id, axis_name);
00472 
00473     // create output source
00474     std::string output_id;
00475     if (axis == -1)
00476         output_id = create_xyz_source(values, fra.size(), anim_id);
00477     else
00478         output_id = create_source_from_array(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, values, fra.size(), is_rot, anim_id, axis_name);
00479 
00480     // create interpolations source
00481     std::string interpolation_id = fake_interpolation_source(fra.size(), anim_id, axis_name);
00482 
00483     std::string sampler_id = std::string(anim_id) + SAMPLER_ID_SUFFIX;
00484     COLLADASW::LibraryAnimations::Sampler sampler(sw, sampler_id);
00485     std::string empty;
00486     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, input_id));
00487     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT, COLLADABU::URI(empty, output_id));
00488 
00489     // TODO create in/out tangents source
00490 
00491     // this input is required
00492     sampler.addInput(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION, COLLADABU::URI(empty, interpolation_id));
00493 
00494     addSampler(sampler);
00495 
00496     std::string target = translate_id(ob_name + "_" + bone_name) + "/" + transform_sid;
00497     addChannel(COLLADABU::URI(empty, sampler_id), target);
00498 
00499     closeAnimation();
00500 }
00501 
00502 float AnimationExporter::convert_time(float frame)
00503 {
00504     return FRA2TIME(frame);
00505 }
00506 
00507 float AnimationExporter::convert_angle(float angle)
00508 {
00509     return COLLADABU::Math::Utils::radToDegF(angle);
00510 }
00511 
00512 std::string AnimationExporter::get_semantic_suffix(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic)
00513 {
00514     switch(semantic) {
00515         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT:
00516             return INPUT_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00517         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT:
00518             return OUTPUT_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00519         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION:
00520             return INTERPOLATION_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00521         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT:
00522             return INTANGENT_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00523         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT:
00524             return OUTTANGENT_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00525         default:
00526             break;
00527     }
00528     return "";
00529 }
00530 
00531 void AnimationExporter::add_source_parameters(COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList& param,
00532                                               COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic, bool is_rot, const char *axis, bool transform)
00533 {
00534     switch(semantic) {
00535         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT:
00536             param.push_back("TIME");
00537             break;
00538         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT:
00539             if (is_rot) {
00540                 param.push_back("ANGLE");
00541             }
00542             else {
00543                 if (axis) {
00544                     param.push_back(axis);
00545                 }
00546                 else 
00547                     if ( transform )
00548                     {
00549                         param.push_back("TRANSFORM");  
00550                     }
00551                     else { //assumes if axis isn't specified all axises are added
00552                         param.push_back("X");
00553                         param.push_back("Y");
00554                         param.push_back("Z");
00555                     }
00556             }
00557             break;
00558         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT:
00559         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT:
00560             param.push_back("X");
00561             param.push_back("Y");
00562             break;
00563         default:
00564             break;
00565     }
00566 }
00567 
00568 void AnimationExporter::get_source_values(BezTriple *bezt, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic, bool rotation, float *values, int *length)
00569 {
00570     switch (semantic) {
00571         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT:
00572             *length = 1;
00573             values[0] = convert_time(bezt->vec[1][0]);
00574             break;
00575         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT:
00576             *length = 1;
00577             if (rotation) {
00578                 values[0] = RAD2DEGF(bezt->vec[1][1]);
00579             }
00580             else {
00581                 values[0] = bezt->vec[1][1];
00582             }
00583             break;
00584 
00585         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT:
00586             *length = 2;
00587             values[0] = convert_time(bezt->vec[0][0]);
00588             if (bezt->ipo != BEZT_IPO_BEZ) {
00589                 // We're in a mixed interpolation scenario, set zero as it's irrelevant but value might contain unused data
00590                 values[0] = 0;  
00591                 values[1] = 0;  
00592             }
00593             else if (rotation) {
00594                 values[1] = RAD2DEGF(bezt->vec[0][1]);
00595             }
00596             else {
00597                 values[1] = bezt->vec[0][1];
00598             }
00599             break;
00600 
00601         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT:
00602             *length = 2;
00603             values[0] = convert_time(bezt->vec[2][0]);
00604             if (bezt->ipo != BEZT_IPO_BEZ) {
00605                 // We're in a mixed interpolation scenario, set zero as it's irrelevant but value might contain unused data
00606                 values[0] = 0;  
00607                 values[1] = 0;  
00608             }
00609             else if (rotation) {
00610                 values[1] = RAD2DEGF(bezt->vec[2][1]);
00611             }
00612             else {
00613                 values[1] = bezt->vec[2][1];
00614             }
00615             break;
00616             break;
00617         default:
00618             *length = 0;
00619             break;
00620     }
00621 }
00622 
00623 std::string AnimationExporter::create_source_from_fcurve(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic, FCurve *fcu, const std::string& anim_id, const char *axis_name)
00624 {
00625     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(semantic);
00626 
00627     //bool is_rotation = !strcmp(fcu->rna_path, "rotation");
00628     bool is_angle = false;
00629 
00630     if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "rotation")) is_angle = true;
00631 
00632     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00633     source.setId(source_id);
00634     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00635     source.setAccessorCount(fcu->totvert);
00636 
00637     switch (semantic) {
00638         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT:
00639         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT:
00640             source.setAccessorStride(1);            
00641             break;
00642         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::IN_TANGENT:
00643         case COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUT_TANGENT:
00644             source.setAccessorStride(2);            
00645             break;
00646         default:
00647             break;
00648     }
00649 
00650 
00651     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00652     add_source_parameters(param, semantic, is_angle, axis_name, false);
00653 
00654     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00655 
00656     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fcu->totvert; i++) {
00657         float values[3]; // be careful!
00658         int length = 0;
00659         get_source_values(&fcu->bezt[i], semantic, is_angle, values, &length);
00660         for (int j = 0; j < length; j++)
00661             source.appendValues(values[j]);
00662     }
00663 
00664     source.finish();
00665 
00666     return source_id;
00667 }
00668 
00669 //Currently called only to get OUTPUT source values ( if rotation and hence the axis is also specified )
00670 std::string AnimationExporter::create_source_from_array(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic, float *v, int tot, bool is_rot, const std::string& anim_id, const char *axis_name)
00671 {
00672     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(semantic);
00673 
00674     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00675     source.setId(source_id);
00676     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00677     source.setAccessorCount(tot);
00678     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00679 
00680     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00681     add_source_parameters(param, semantic, is_rot, axis_name,  false);
00682 
00683     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00684 
00685     for (int i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00686         float val = v[i];
00688         //  val = convert_time(val);
00689         //else
00690         if (is_rot)
00691             val = RAD2DEGF(val);
00692         source.appendValues(val);
00693     }
00694 
00695     source.finish();
00696 
00697     return source_id;
00698 }
00699 // only used for sources with INPUT semantic
00700 std::string AnimationExporter::create_source_from_vector(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic, std::vector<float> &fra, bool is_rot, const std::string& anim_id, const char *axis_name)
00701 {
00702     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(semantic);
00703 
00704     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00705     source.setId(source_id);
00706     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00707     source.setAccessorCount(fra.size());
00708     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00709 
00710     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00711     add_source_parameters(param, semantic, is_rot, axis_name, false);
00712 
00713     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00714 
00715     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
00716     for (it = fra.begin(); it != fra.end(); it++) {
00717         float val = *it;
00718         //if (semantic == COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INPUT)
00719         val = convert_time(val);
00720         /*else if (is_rot)
00721         val = convert_angle(val);*/
00722         source.appendValues(val);
00723     }
00724 
00725     source.finish();
00726 
00727     return source_id;
00728 }
00729 
00730 std::string AnimationExporter::create_4x4_source(std::vector<float> &frames , Object * ob_arm, Bone *bone , const std::string& anim_id)
00731 {
00732     COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic = COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT;
00733     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(semantic);
00734 
00735     COLLADASW::Float4x4Source source(mSW);
00736     source.setId(source_id);
00737     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00738     source.setAccessorCount(frames.size());
00739     source.setAccessorStride(16);
00740 
00741     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00742     add_source_parameters(param, semantic, false, NULL, true);
00743 
00744     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00745 
00746     bPoseChannel *parchan = NULL;
00747     bPoseChannel *pchan = NULL;
00748     bPose *pose = ob_arm->pose;
00749 
00750     pchan = get_pose_channel(pose, bone->name);
00751 
00752     if (!pchan)
00753         return "";
00754 
00755     parchan = pchan->parent;
00756 
00757     enable_fcurves(ob_arm->adt->action, bone->name);
00758 
00759     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
00760     int j = 0;
00761     for (it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); it++) {
00762         float mat[4][4], ipar[4][4];
00763 
00764         float ctime = BKE_frame_to_ctime(scene, *it);
00765 
00766         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene , &ob_arm->id, ob_arm->adt, ctime, ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
00767         where_is_pose_bone(scene, ob_arm, pchan, ctime, 1);
00768 
00769         // compute bone local mat
00770         if (bone->parent) {
00771             invert_m4_m4(ipar, parchan->pose_mat);
00772             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, ipar, pchan->pose_mat);
00773         }
00774         else
00775             copy_m4_m4(mat, pchan->pose_mat);
00776         UnitConverter converter;
00777 
00778         // SECOND_LIFE_COMPATIBILITY
00779         // AFAIK animation to second life is via BVH, but no
00780         // reason to not have the collada-animation be correct
00781         if (export_settings->second_life)
00782         {
00783             float temp[4][4];
00784             copy_m4_m4(temp, bone->arm_mat);
00785             temp[3][0] = temp[3][1] = temp[3][2] = 0.0f;
00786             invert_m4(temp);
00787 
00788             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, mat, temp);
00789 
00790             if (bone->parent)
00791             {
00792                 copy_m4_m4(temp, bone->parent->arm_mat);
00793                 temp[3][0] = temp[3][1] = temp[3][2] = 0.0f;
00794 
00795                 mult_m4_m4m4(mat, temp, mat);
00796             }
00797         }
00798 
00799         float outmat[4][4];
00800         converter.mat4_to_dae(outmat,mat);
00801 
00802 
00803         source.appendValues(outmat);
00804 
00805 
00806         j++;
00807     }
00808 
00809     enable_fcurves(ob_arm->adt->action, NULL);
00810 
00811     source.finish();
00812 
00813     return source_id;
00814 }
00815 // only used for sources with OUTPUT semantic ( locations and scale)
00816 std::string AnimationExporter::create_xyz_source(float *v, int tot, const std::string& anim_id)
00817 {
00818     COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics semantic = COLLADASW::InputSemantic::OUTPUT;
00819     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(semantic);
00820 
00821     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00822     source.setId(source_id);
00823     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00824     source.setAccessorCount(tot);
00825     source.setAccessorStride(3);
00826 
00827     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00828     add_source_parameters(param, semantic, false, NULL, false);
00829 
00830     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00831 
00832     for (int i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00833         source.appendValues(*v, *(v + 1), *(v + 2));
00834         v += 3;
00835     }
00836 
00837     source.finish();
00838 
00839     return source_id;
00840 }
00841 
00842 std::string AnimationExporter::create_interpolation_source(FCurve *fcu, const std::string& anim_id, const char *axis_name, bool *has_tangents)
00843 {
00844     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION);
00845 
00846     COLLADASW::NameSource source(mSW);
00847     source.setId(source_id);
00848     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00849     source.setAccessorCount(fcu->totvert);
00850     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00851 
00852     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00853     param.push_back("INTERPOLATION");
00854 
00855     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00856 
00857     *has_tangents = false;
00858 
00859     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fcu->totvert; i++) {
00860         if (fcu->bezt[i].ipo==BEZT_IPO_BEZ) {
00861             source.appendValues(BEZIER_NAME);
00862             *has_tangents = true;
00863         }
00864         else if (fcu->bezt[i].ipo==BEZT_IPO_CONST) {
00865             source.appendValues(STEP_NAME);
00866         }
00867         else { // BEZT_IPO_LIN
00868             source.appendValues(LINEAR_NAME);
00869         }
00870     }
00871     // unsupported? -- HERMITE, CARDINAL, BSPLINE, NURBS
00872 
00873     source.finish();
00874 
00875     return source_id;
00876 }
00877 
00878 std::string AnimationExporter::fake_interpolation_source(int tot, const std::string& anim_id, const char *axis_name)
00879 {
00880     std::string source_id = anim_id + get_semantic_suffix(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::INTERPOLATION);
00881 
00882     COLLADASW::NameSource source(mSW);
00883     source.setId(source_id);
00884     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00885     source.setAccessorCount(tot);
00886     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00887 
00888     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00889     param.push_back("INTERPOLATION");
00890 
00891     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00892 
00893     for (int i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00894         source.appendValues(LINEAR_NAME);
00895     }
00896 
00897     source.finish();
00898 
00899     return source_id;
00900 }
00901 
00902 std::string AnimationExporter::get_light_param_sid(char *rna_path, int tm_type, const char *axis_name, bool append_axis)
00903 {
00904     std::string tm_name;
00905     // when given rna_path, determine tm_type from it
00906     if (rna_path) {
00907         char *name = extract_transform_name(rna_path);
00908 
00909         if (!strcmp(name, "color"))
00910             tm_type = 1;
00911         else if (!strcmp(name, "spot_size"))
00912             tm_type = 2;
00913         else if (!strcmp(name, "spot_blend"))
00914             tm_type = 3;
00915         else if (!strcmp(name, "distance"))
00916             tm_type = 4;
00917         else
00918             tm_type = -1;
00919     }
00920 
00921     switch (tm_type) {
00922         case 1:
00923             tm_name = "color";
00924             break;
00925         case 2:
00926             tm_name = "fall_off_angle";
00927             break;
00928         case 3:
00929             tm_name = "fall_off_exponent";
00930             break;
00931         case 4:
00932             tm_name = "blender/blender_dist";
00933             break;
00934 
00935         default:
00936             tm_name = "";
00937             break;
00938     }
00939 
00940     if (tm_name.size()) {
00941         if (axis_name[0])
00942             return tm_name + "." + std::string(axis_name);
00943         else 
00944             return tm_name;
00945     }
00946 
00947     return std::string("");
00948 }
00949 
00950 std::string AnimationExporter::get_camera_param_sid(char *rna_path, int tm_type, const char *axis_name, bool append_axis)
00951 {
00952     std::string tm_name;
00953     // when given rna_path, determine tm_type from it
00954     if (rna_path) {
00955         char *name = extract_transform_name(rna_path);
00956 
00957         if (!strcmp(name, "lens"))
00958             tm_type = 0;
00959         else if (!strcmp(name, "ortho_scale"))
00960             tm_type = 1;
00961         else if (!strcmp(name, "clip_end"))
00962             tm_type = 2;
00963         else if (!strcmp(name, "clip_start"))
00964             tm_type = 3;
00965 
00966         else
00967             tm_type = -1;
00968     }
00969 
00970     switch (tm_type) {
00971         case 0:
00972             tm_name = "xfov";
00973             break;
00974         case 1:
00975             tm_name = "xmag";
00976             break;
00977         case 2:
00978             tm_name = "zfar";
00979             break;
00980         case 3:
00981             tm_name = "znear";
00982             break;
00983 
00984         default:
00985             tm_name = "";
00986             break;
00987     }
00988 
00989     if (tm_name.size()) {
00990         if (axis_name[0])
00991             return tm_name + "." + std::string(axis_name);
00992         else 
00993             return tm_name;
00994     }
00995 
00996     return std::string("");
00997 }
00998 
00999 // Assign sid of the animated parameter or transform 
01000 // for rotation, axis name is always appended and the value of append_axis is ignored
01001 std::string AnimationExporter::get_transform_sid(char *rna_path, int tm_type, const char *axis_name, bool append_axis)
01002 {
01003     std::string tm_name;
01004     bool is_rotation =false;
01005     // when given rna_path, determine tm_type from it
01006     if (rna_path) {
01007         char *name = extract_transform_name(rna_path);
01008 
01009         if (!strcmp(name, "rotation_euler"))
01010             tm_type = 0;
01011         else if (!strcmp(name, "rotation_quaternion"))
01012             tm_type = 1;
01013         else if (!strcmp(name, "scale"))
01014             tm_type = 2;
01015         else if (!strcmp(name, "location"))
01016             tm_type = 3;
01017         else if (!strcmp(name, "specular_hardness"))
01018             tm_type = 4;
01019         else if (!strcmp(name, "specular_color"))
01020             tm_type = 5;
01021         else if (!strcmp(name, "diffuse_color"))
01022             tm_type = 6;
01023         else if (!strcmp(name, "alpha"))
01024             tm_type = 7;
01025         else if (!strcmp(name, "ior"))
01026             tm_type = 8;
01027 
01028         else
01029             tm_type = -1;
01030     }
01031 
01032     switch (tm_type) {
01033         case 0:
01034         case 1:
01035             tm_name = "rotation";
01036             is_rotation = true;
01037             break;
01038         case 2:
01039             tm_name = "scale";
01040             break;
01041         case 3:
01042             tm_name = "location";
01043             break;
01044         case 4:
01045             tm_name = "shininess";
01046             break;
01047         case 5:
01048             tm_name = "specular";
01049             break;
01050         case 6:
01051             tm_name = "diffuse";
01052             break;  
01053         case 7:
01054             tm_name = "transparency";
01055             break;  
01056         case 8:
01057             tm_name = "index_of_refraction";
01058             break;  
01059 
01060         default:
01061             tm_name = "";
01062             break;
01063     }
01064 
01065     if (tm_name.size()) {
01066         if (is_rotation)
01067             return tm_name + std::string(axis_name) + ".ANGLE";
01068         else
01069             if (axis_name[0])
01070                 return tm_name + "." + std::string(axis_name);
01071             else 
01072                 return tm_name;
01073     }
01074 
01075     return std::string("");
01076 }
01077 
01078 char* AnimationExporter::extract_transform_name(char *rna_path)
01079 {
01080     char *dot = strrchr(rna_path, '.');
01081     return dot ? (dot + 1) : rna_path;
01082 }
01083 
01084 //find keyframes of all the objects animations
01085 void AnimationExporter::find_frames(Object *ob, std::vector<float> &fra)
01086 {
01087     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve*)ob->adt->action->curves.first;
01088 
01089     for (; fcu; fcu = fcu->next) {
01090 
01091         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fcu->totvert; i++) {
01092             float f = fcu->bezt[i].vec[1][0];
01093             if (std::find(fra.begin(), fra.end(), f) == fra.end())   
01094                 fra.push_back(f);
01095         }
01096     }
01097 
01098     // keep the keys in ascending order
01099     std::sort(fra.begin(), fra.end());
01100 }
01101 
01102 
01103 
01104 // enable fcurves driving a specific bone, disable all the rest
01105 // if bone_name = NULL enable all fcurves
01106 void AnimationExporter::enable_fcurves(bAction *act, char *bone_name)
01107 {
01108     FCurve *fcu;
01109     char prefix[200];
01110 
01111     if (bone_name)
01112         BLI_snprintf(prefix, sizeof(prefix), "pose.bones[\"%s\"]", bone_name);
01113 
01114     for (fcu = (FCurve*)act->curves.first; fcu; fcu = fcu->next) {
01115         if (bone_name) {
01116             if (!strncmp(fcu->rna_path, prefix, strlen(prefix)))
01117                 fcu->flag &= ~FCURVE_DISABLED;
01118             else
01119                 fcu->flag |= FCURVE_DISABLED;
01120         }
01121         else {
01122             fcu->flag &= ~FCURVE_DISABLED;
01123         }
01124     }
01125 }
01126 
01127 bool AnimationExporter::hasAnimations(Scene *sce)
01128 {
01129     Base *base= (Base*) sce->base.first;
01130 
01131     while(base) {
01132         Object *ob = base->object;
01133 
01134         FCurve *fcu = 0;
01135         //Check for object transform animations
01136         if (ob->adt && ob->adt->action)
01137             fcu = (FCurve*)ob->adt->action->curves.first;
01138         //Check for Lamp parameter animations
01139         else if ( (ob->type == OB_LAMP ) && ((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt && ((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt->action )
01140             fcu = (FCurve*)(((Lamp*)ob ->data)->adt->action->curves.first);
01141         //Check for Camera parameter animations
01142         else if ( (ob->type == OB_CAMERA ) && ((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt && ((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt->action )
01143             fcu = (FCurve*)(((Camera*)ob ->data)->adt->action->curves.first);
01144 
01145         //Check Material Effect parameter animations.
01146         for (int a = 0; a < ob->totcol; a++)
01147         {
01148             Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, a+1);
01149             if (!ma) continue;
01150             if (ma->adt && ma->adt->action)
01151             {
01152                 fcu = (FCurve*)ma->adt->action->curves.first;   
01153             }
01154         }
01155 
01156         if ( fcu) 
01157             return true;
01158         base= base->next;
01159     }
01160     return false;
01161 }
01162 
01163 //------------------------------- Not used in the new system.--------------------------------------------------------
01164 void AnimationExporter::find_rotation_frames(Object *ob, std::vector<float> &fra, const char *prefix, int rotmode)
01165 {
01166     if (rotmode > 0)
01167         find_frames(ob, fra, prefix, "rotation_euler");
01168     else if (rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT)
01169         find_frames(ob, fra, prefix, "rotation_quaternion");
01170     /*else if (rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE)
01171     ;*/
01172 }
01173 
01174 void AnimationExporter::find_frames(Object *ob, std::vector<float> &fra, const char *prefix, const char *tm_name)
01175 {
01176     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve*)ob->adt->action->curves.first;
01177 
01178     for (; fcu; fcu = fcu->next) {
01179         if (prefix && strncmp(prefix, fcu->rna_path, strlen(prefix)))
01180             continue;
01181 
01182         char *name = extract_transform_name(fcu->rna_path);
01183         if (!strcmp(name, tm_name)) {
01184             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fcu->totvert; i++) {
01185                 float f = fcu->bezt[i].vec[1][0];
01186                 if (std::find(fra.begin(), fra.end(), f) == fra.end())   
01187                     fra.push_back(f);
01188             }
01189         }
01190     }
01191 
01192     // keep the keys in ascending order
01193     std::sort(fra.begin(), fra.end());
01194 }
01195 
01196 void AnimationExporter::write_bone_animation(Object *ob_arm, Bone *bone)
01197 {
01198     if (!ob_arm->adt)
01199         return;
01200 
01201     //write bone animations for 3 transform types
01202     //i=0 --> rotations
01203     //i=1 --> scale
01204     //i=2 --> location
01205     for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
01206         sample_and_write_bone_animation(ob_arm, bone, i);
01207 
01208     for (Bone *child = (Bone*)bone->childbase.first; child; child = child->next)
01209         write_bone_animation(ob_arm, child);
01210 }
01211 
01212 void AnimationExporter::sample_and_write_bone_animation(Object *ob_arm, Bone *bone, int transform_type)
01213 {
01214     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob_arm->data;
01215     int flag = arm->flag;
01216     std::vector<float> fra;
01217     char prefix[256];
01218 
01219     BLI_snprintf(prefix, sizeof(prefix), "pose.bones[\"%s\"]", bone->name);
01220 
01221     bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(ob_arm->pose, bone->name);
01222     if (!pchan)
01223         return;
01224     //Fill frame array with key frame values framed at \param:transform_type
01225     switch (transform_type) {
01226         case 0:
01227             find_rotation_frames(ob_arm, fra, prefix, pchan->rotmode);
01228             break;
01229         case 1:
01230             find_frames(ob_arm, fra, prefix, "scale");
01231             break;
01232         case 2:
01233             find_frames(ob_arm, fra, prefix, "location");
01234             break;
01235         default:
01236             return;
01237     }
01238 
01239     // exit rest position
01240     if (flag & ARM_RESTPOS) {
01241         arm->flag &= ~ARM_RESTPOS;
01242         where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
01243     }
01244     //v array will hold all values which will be exported. 
01245     if (fra.size()) {
01246         float *values = (float*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * fra.size(), "temp. anim frames");
01247         sample_animation(values, fra, transform_type, bone, ob_arm, pchan);
01248 
01249         if (transform_type == 0) {
01250             // write x, y, z curves separately if it is rotation
01251             float *axisValues = (float*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * fra.size(), "temp. anim frames");   
01252 
01253             for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01254                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < fra.size(); j++)
01255                     axisValues[j] = values[j * 3 + i];
01256 
01257                 dae_bone_animation(fra, axisValues, transform_type, i, id_name(ob_arm), bone->name);
01258             }
01259             MEM_freeN(axisValues);
01260         }
01261         else {
01262             // write xyz at once if it is location or scale
01263             dae_bone_animation(fra, values, transform_type, -1, id_name(ob_arm), bone->name);
01264         }
01265 
01266         MEM_freeN(values);
01267     }
01268 
01269     // restore restpos
01270     if (flag & ARM_RESTPOS) 
01271         arm->flag = flag;
01272     where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
01273 }
01274 
01275 void AnimationExporter::sample_animation(float *v, std::vector<float> &frames, int type, Bone *bone, Object *ob_arm, bPoseChannel *pchan)
01276 {
01277     bPoseChannel *parchan = NULL;
01278     bPose *pose = ob_arm->pose;
01279 
01280     pchan = get_pose_channel(pose, bone->name);
01281 
01282     if (!pchan)
01283         return;
01284 
01285     parchan = pchan->parent;
01286 
01287     enable_fcurves(ob_arm->adt->action, bone->name);
01288 
01289     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
01290     for (it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); it++) {
01291         float mat[4][4], ipar[4][4];
01292 
01293         float ctime = BKE_frame_to_ctime(scene, *it);
01294 
01295 
01296         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene , &ob_arm->id, ob_arm->adt, ctime, ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
01297         where_is_pose_bone(scene, ob_arm, pchan, ctime, 1);
01298 
01299         // compute bone local mat
01300         if (bone->parent) {
01301             invert_m4_m4(ipar, parchan->pose_mat);
01302             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, ipar, pchan->pose_mat);
01303         }
01304         else
01305             copy_m4_m4(mat, pchan->pose_mat);
01306 
01307         switch (type) {
01308             case 0:
01309                 mat4_to_eul(v, mat);
01310                 break;
01311             case 1:
01312                 mat4_to_size(v, mat);
01313                 break;
01314             case 2:
01315                 copy_v3_v3(v, mat[3]);
01316                 break;
01317         }
01318 
01319         v += 3;
01320     }
01321 
01322     enable_fcurves(ob_arm->adt->action, NULL);
01323 }
